item.title: Why Your Executive Team Is So Dysfunctional
item.description: With executive teams, there is often an unconscious role playing—an emotional reenactment of old stories.

item.title: Are You a Quiet Leader? Why Silent CEOs Keep Beating the Loud Ones
item.description: Hard data, brain science, and an Antarctic thriller reveal why quiet leadership is the real advantage.

item.title: This Women-Led Startup Just Paid its Employees’ Child Care Bills
item.description: The twin sisters and co-founders of CAKES Body say companies should do more to help working parents juggle their responsibilities.

item.description: Give your business the chance to be featured next to this year’s top B2B providers. We’ve made it easy.

item.title: Melinda French Gates Didn’t Fund Her Daughter’s Startup. Experts Call It a Smart Move
item.description: Other billionaires and financial experts say investing in a family member’s new business can lead to trouble and strained relationships.
